definitions.definition: A representation of anything (as a person, a landscape, a building) upon canvas, paper, or other surface, by drawing , painting , printing , photography , etc.
An image ; a representation as in the imagination .

examples: There was a picture hanging above the fireplace.
I took a picture of the church.
Casablanca is my all-time favorite picture .

definitions.definition: Cinema ( as a form of entertainment ) .
A paragon , a perfect example or specimen ( of a category).
examples: She's the very picture of health.
The garden is a real picture at this time of year.

definitions.definition: The art of painting ; representation by painting.

examples: The employment picture for the older middle class is not so good.
You can't just look at the election, you've got to look at the big picture .

definitions.definition: A sample of an illegal drug.
examples: If you want me to buy your weed I’ll need a picture .

definitions.definition: A format string in the COBOL programming language .

main_definition: A representation of anything (as a person, a landscape, a building) upon canvas, paper, or other surface, by drawing , painting , printing , photography , etc.
secondary_definitions: An image ; a representation as in the imagination .
( dated or India ) A motion picture .
( in the plural , informal ) ( "the pictures" ) Cinema ( as a form of entertainment ) .
A paragon , a perfect example or specimen ( of a category).
The art of painting ; representation by painting.
( MLE ) A sample of an illegal drug.
( programming ) A format string in the COBOL programming language .
